headline: Assessing Huntington Ingalls Industries (HII) Valuation After Strong Share Price Momentum
summary: Huntington Ingalls Industries (HII) has caught investor attention after its recent share price move, with the stock now around $397.77. That shift is prompting fresh questions about how its current valuation stacks up. See our latest analysis for Huntington Ingalls Industries. That sharp 7.69% 1 day share price return, on top of a 30 day share price return of 11.59% and a 90 day gain of 28.50%, sits alongside a 1 year total shareholder return of 141.61%. Taken together, these figures point to...
